ygData.subject: SV: [EverQuest] Re: MORE then one account?? please explain
ygData.msgSnippet: No, but you can create new characters on all the servers (cept legend less you pay more). -domi ... Från: nara MKs [mailto:masterkiis_nara@yahoo.com] Skickat:
ygData.messageBody:
No, but you can create new characters on all the servers (cept legend less
you pay more).

-domi

-----Ursprungligt meddelande-----
Från: nara MKs [mailto:masterkiis_nara@...]
Skickat: den 14 mars 2002 23:46
Till: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Ämne: Re: [EverQuest] Re: MORE then one account?? please explain


So within our one account we can create characters
that play on other servers? For instance I can take my
Cleric (or Warrior) that I play on Ayonae Ro to say
Fennin??

Naara, Barb Warrior
Ayonae Ro
